name: Rabid Strike
flavorText: Those who survive the winter fever retain the strength of the madness it brings.
flavorTextHtml: Those who survive the winter fever retain the strength of the madness it brings.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Damage Increased by [31.0 - 35.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Spirit spenders that teleport you while Epiphany is active are also mimicked on a nearby target with 378% increased damage for free. (Monk Only) [350 - 450]%
